QuestData.Title: The Brave and the Bold
QuestData.Description: <Rau dismissively waves a note around with Taur-ahe markings on it.>$B$BThose mongrels have captured one of our braves! They're threatening to kill him if we don't pull back!$B$BWe'll never allow those Grimtotem cowards to keep Freewind Post! Please, rescue him before it's too late, $c.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Free him before it's too late.
QuestData.CompletionText: Where's our brave? Is he alive?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for freeing him, $n. Those Grimtotem would have killed him in cold blood.
